meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Change</kanji> your face with <kanji>cosmetics</kanji>! This is via <vocabulary>makeup</vocabulary> or, of course, <vocabulary>cosmetics</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading for 化 is a new reading, け. To remember this, think about someone putting on <vocabulary>makeup</vocabulary>. They finish putting it on, and then you say "<reading>K, show</reading> (けしょう) me!"
